description: Some of these laughing dongers are among my all time favourites. The character ᗨ for instance makes a fantastic laughing mouth. It looks more like a laugh than a smile if the emoticon’s eyes are shut as well. Characters like ^, ˃̶̀ with ˂̶́, or > with < are perfect examples. title: Big Wide Open Mouths
